Name: Dan's Odyssey
About the game: Dan's odyssey is an arcade like arena top down shooter. you fight shapes in a futuristic setting with the objective of completing the boss fights, upgrading your stats and beating the high score key features: - satisfying gunplay and movement - ability to slow down time or deploy your turret for a helping hand - unlock upgrades points to upgrade your deployable turret weapon and health - classic arcade style beat the high score - great sound track
Meta Title: Dan's Odyssey: Nov 3, 2022, Dan J Haynes and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Dan's Odyssey? Check out the release date (Nov 3, 2022), developer insights from Dan J Haynes, and a complete game summary.
